TOWARDS ROBUST TRANSFER LEARNING - PREVENTING THE TRANSFER OF SPURIOUS FEATURES WITH TASK INTERPOLATION

Drawing from an information geometric model of transfer learning, we show that the transfer of spurious features can be largely prevented by a simple task interpolation-based transfer algorithm that requires no more target images nor epochs than canonical fine-tuning.

Transfer LearningSpurious FeaturesRobustness
Drowsiness Detection

Multiple CNN and LSTM models are implemented to detect driver drowsiness from videos.

Deep Neural NetworksComputer Vision
Active Simultaneous Localization and Mapping in Unstructured Environment with a Quadrotor

This paper proposes an active SLAM system that allows an agent to explore its surroundings, using visual-inertial data from an RGBD camera based on information theoretic criterion.

RoboticsSLAMPlanningInformation Theory
